title: Bottom microphone stopped working. Run test/followed advice no luck. Any advice or customer support
content:
Phone was  fine till today. 
However suddenly people can't hear me during a call unless I use load speaker. I've followed all the advise on the page. Used the recorder can't hear myself much at all. 
Crackly white noise sound more than anything else.
I haven't dropped my phone 
It hasn't got wet, it just stopped working.
In fact it's a year old to the date.

Would the above indicate that the bottom microphone is damaged. If so 
does this mean it has to be sent to be fixed?
